description: The Steelhead Long Sleeve Tee is made from a premium 100 % organic cotton jersey and offers a soft and comfortable feel. The front and back of this long sleeve t-shirt feature a stunning Steelhead illustration created by the talented artist Alana Louise. Designed in a regular fit, it provides a relaxed and flattering look that is true to size. You can feel confident in its sustainable and high-quality construction thanks to the GOTS and Oeko-Tex® standard 100 certifications.
name: Hooke Steelhead LS Tee - Mens
